Quote.Quote: The finest actor in the country
Quote.Author: Amitabh Bachchan

Quote.Quote: I feel that the upcoming generation can watch performance of Mohanlal and learn a lot. It can be called a textbook of acting
Quote.Author: A. K. Lohithadas

Quote.Quote: India's answer to Marlon Brando
Quote.Author: Time Magazine

Quote.Quote: He is the best actor India has ever produced
Quote.Author: Priyadarshan

Quote.Quote: Most immensely talented actor
Quote.Author: Shaji N Karun

Quote.Quote: I'm sometimes jealous seeing the easiness of Lal's acting. Just can't dream of doing some characters he had done
Quote.Author: Rajni Kanth

Quote.Quote: I feel sorry that he was not born to me. His acting is really interesting
Quote.Author: Sivaji Ganesan

Quote.Quote: He is one of the finest natural actors India can ever come across
Quote.Author: Prakash Raj

Quote.Quote: He is an institution of Acting. We can't compare him with any of other actor
Quote.Author: Suresh Menon

Quote.Quote: Lal's acting is a gift of God
Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai

Quote.Quote: I'm always comfortable while acting with Lal because he is the best actor I know. So i also try to raise up to him
Quote.Author: Jagathy Sreekumar

Quote.Quote: Lal's style of performance enlightened me about the new phase of acting
Quote.Author: Amitabh Bachchan

Quote.Quote: As an artist, I was amazed by seeing his acting skills
Quote.Author: Sheela

Quote.Quote: Lal's substlety in dancing without mastering it astonishes even an eminent dancer
Quote.Author: Kamal Haasan

Quote.Quote: Mohanlal owns rare acting style and his paculiarity of acting and versatality putting him in a different league of artists
Quote.Author: Adoor Gopalakrishnan

Quote.Quote: Robert De Niro of Indian Screen
Quote.Author: Ram Gopal Varma

Quote.Quote: His gift is that he underplays emotions
Quote.Author: Hariharan (Director)

Quote.Quote: A fantastic, marvelous and unpredictable actor
Quote.Author: Mammootty

Quote.Quote: If Mohanlal is there then I'm ready to do a Malayalam film
Quote.Author: Shilpa Shetty

Quote.Quote: Mohanlal is quite simply an amazing actor for me
Quote.Author: Shahrukh Khan

Quote.Quote: I feel there is no actor in Indian Cinema like Mohanlal who can satisfy the expectations of a director
Quote.Author: Ram Gopal Varma

Quote.Quote: We haven't exploited Mohanlal's talent yet
Quote.Author: Shaji N Karun

Quote.Quote: If Mohanlal goes to Hollywood then almost all the Hollywood actors will lose their jobs. He will defeat them all
Quote.Author: R. Madhavan

Quote.Quote: Hereafter, I will never work with a man of whom I am a fan. I often forgot to say 'Cut' in Iruvar
Quote.Author: Mani Ratnam

Quote.Quote: The presence of a versatile actor like Mohanlal in Malayalam Cinema is a matter of pride for me
Quote.Author: Madhu

Quote.Quote: He never prepares for any role or scene. He is not bothered how he looks or what he does. Once the camera is on, he is a transformed person. As he does only one film at a time, he knows everything about the film, nothing more
Quote.Author: Priyadarshan

Quote.Quote: I am always attracted by Mohanlal's acting
Quote.Author: Kay Kay Menon

Quote.Quote: Mohanlal is a privilege not only to Malayalam but also to the World Cinema
Quote.Author: M. T. Vasudevan Nair

Quote.Quote: He is the God of Indian Cinema
Quote.Author: Suniel Shetty

Quote.Quote: Most flexible actor in the country
Quote.Author: Kamal Haasan

Quote.Quote: I feel really sad that I haven't gotten the opportunity to work with a great artist like Lal
Quote.Author: Sharada
